powCoinsCreated.title: Proof-of-Work Coins Created
powCoinsCreated.description: The number of coins created through Proof-of-Work.

posCoinsCreated.title: Proof-of-Stake Coins Created
posCoinsCreated.description: The number of coins created through Proof-of-Stake.

powDifficulty.title: Proof-of-Work Difficulty
powDifficulty.description: The difficulty of the Proof-of-Work algorithm.

posDifficulty.title: Proof-of-Stake Difficulty
posDifficulty.description: The difficulty of the Proof-of-Stake algorithm.

coinsupply.title: Coin Supply
coinsupply.description: The total number of coins in circulation.

blocksize.title: Block Size
blocksize.description: The size of the blocks in the blockchain in bytes.

footer.disclaimer: For Proof-of-Stake (PoS) related values, block 10373 was taken as starting point as first PoS block with 1.0 difficulty. For Proof-of-Work related values, block 1 was taken as starting point.
